mapper.insert: insert into DB_CRC_JOBMST (JOB_NO, SUB_JOB_NO, LANK_SEQ, CMD_DIV, JOB_STS, JOB_DTM, TASKKY, TASKIT, LOCAFR, LOCATO, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, BAR_DATA, DSP_DATA, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG) values (#{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subJobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lankSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmdDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locafr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locato,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qttaor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qtcomp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dspData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DB_CRC_JOBMST set SUB_JOB_NO = #{subJobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LANK_SEQ = #{lankSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMD_DIV = #{cmdDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_STS = #{jobSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_DTM = #{jobDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TASKKY = #{taskky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASKIT = #{taskit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCAFR = #{locafr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATO = #{locato,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTTAOR = #{qttaor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, QTCOMP = #{qtcomp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_MSG = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAR_DATA = #{barData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DSP_DATA = #{dspData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DTM = #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BKCK_FG = #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JOB_NO = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select JOB_NO, SUB_JOB_NO, LANK_SEQ, CMD_DIV, JOB_STS, JOB_DTM, TASKKY, TASKIT, LOCAFR, LOCATO, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, BAR_DATA, DSP_DATA, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_CRC_JOBMST where JOB_NO = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select JOB_NO, SUB_JOB_NO, LANK_SEQ, CMD_DIV, JOB_STS, JOB_DTM, TASKKY, TASKIT, LOCAFR, LOCATO, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, BAR_DATA, DSP_DATA, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_CRC_JOBMST
